full_summary:
=================
### General Information
#### Title
Title: Mini-Crane Supply, Delivery and Setup
#### Reference number
Reference Number: WS4324106652-Doc4324182027

#### Solicitation number
Solicitation Number: WS4324106652

#### Contracting entity
Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

#### Publication date
Publication Date: 2023-11-24

#### Tender closing date
Tender Closing Date: 2024-01-15T14:00:00

#### Description
The Department of National Defence (DND), Canadian Cadet Organization Training Centre, requires the supply, delivery and setup of an electric mini-crane for use by the boat operations located at Kingston, Ontario.

### Technical Information

#### Classification
* Track cranes
* Workshop cranes

#### Trade agreements
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Regions of delivery
* Ontario (except NCR)

### Contracting and Evaluation Details
#### Tender status
* Expired

#### Evaluation criteria
* Lowest Price

### Contact Information
#### Point of contact
Name: Semple, Patrick (SPAC/PSPC)

Contact Information:
Email: [patrick.semple@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:patrick.semple@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Additional Information

- Expected contract start date: 2024-01-15
- Expected contract end date: 2024-04-30
- Notice URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18104965?extsite=MTgxMDQ5NjVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
